title: niranjanIm karuNAranjanIm
sahitya:
niranjanIm karunAranjanIm nikhila lOka nAyakIm bhajAmi


anupallavi

  nirupama sundarIm nIrajAkSIm nityakalyANim nIlavENIm


caraNam    sumadhura bhASiNIm shrtajana pAlinIm sOmAnana yuvatIm sanmArga darshinIm
ramAdEvIm hari hrdayavAsinIm ramaNIyakarIm bharaNi poSiNim
